item.title: Day of Anger
item.description: Day of Anger is a 1967 Spaghetti Western film directed and co-written by Tonino Valerii and starring Lee Van Cleef and Giuliano Gemma, and features a musical score by Riz Ortolani. The film credits the novel Der Tod ritt dienstags by Ron Barker as its basis, although Valerii and screenwriter Ernesto Gastaldi have attested that this credit was primarily included to appease the West German co-producers, and that although some scenes are partially borrowed from it, the film is not an adaptation of Becker's novel.

item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt, also known as The Man from Nowhere, is a Spaghetti Western directed by Michele Lupo and starring Giuliano Gemma, Fernando Sancho and Corinne Marchand.

item.title: Gunman Sent by God
item.description: Gunman Sent by God is a 1968 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Ferroni and starring Anthony Steffen.

item.title: For a Few Extra Dollars
item.description: For a Few Extra Dollars, also known as Fort Yuma Gold and Die Now, Pay Later, is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giorgio Ferroni.

item.title: Kill or Be Killed
item.description: Kill or Be Killed is a 1966 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Tanio Boccia.

item.title: I Want Him Dead
item.description: I Want Him Dead is a 1968 Italian-Spanish Spaghetti Western film directed by Paolo Bianchini and starring Craig Hill.

item.title: Death Rides Along
item.description: Death Rides Along is a 1967 Italian Spaghetti Western film directed by Giuseppe Vari.

item.title: Der Tod ritt dienstags
item.description: Der Tod ritt dienstags ist ein Italowestern des italienischen Regisseurs Tonino Valerii aus dem Jahr 1967 nach einem Roman von Ron Barker.

item.title: Arizona Colt
item.description: Arizona Colt ist ein Italowestern von Michele Lupo aus dem Jahr 1966. In Deutschland ist der Film auch unter dem Titel Halleluja Companeros erschienen. In den hiesigen Kinos lief er, auf 93 Minuten gekürzt, erstmals am 24. Februar 1967.

item.title: Il pistolero segnato da Dio
item.description: Il pistolero segnato da Dio ist ein Italowestern von Giorgio Ferroni aus dem Jahr 1968. Er erhielt bislang keine deutschsprachige Aufführung.
